employer Work Experience Information Assurance Analyst AmerisourceBergen Rockville MD October 2016 to Present Performed IT risk assessment based on the NIST standards to ensure that security designs sufficiently mitigate risk and prepared risk assessment reports and provided recommendations to client Developed test plans and conducted security test and evaluations based on NIST 80053A Met with IT inherited by the information system in accordance with the organization defined monitoring strategy Ensured that appropriate steps are taken to implement information security requirements throughout
